meanings.definition: The taste or flavor of something.
meanings.sent1: The ice cream had delicious flavas.
meanings.sent2: I love trying different flavas of chips.
meanings.sent3: The pizza had so many flavas, it was like a flavor explosion!
meanings.sent4: Her cooking always has unexpected flavas that surprise me.
meanings.sent5: The bakery offered a wide selection of flavas to choose from.

meanings.sent1: His music has unique flavas that set him apart.
meanings.sent2: The painting captured the artist's creative flavas.
meanings.sent3: The party had a mix of different flavas in terms of music and decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her personality had many different flavas, making her interesting to be around.
meanings.sent5: The book had a nostalgic flavas that reminded me of my childhood.

meanings.definition: A variety or range of different flavors.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant offered a menu with diverse flavas to choose from.
meanings.sent2: The festival showcased a wide range of cultural flavas.
meanings.sent3: The smoothie had a blend of fruity flavas that was refreshing.
meanings.sent4: The market had an array of exotic flavas from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The tea shop had unique flavas that I had never tasted before.
